ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank the residents of Arboleda, La Margarita, Playa and Villodas and their field personnel Orlando Gonzalez, Luis Rivera, Luis Perez, Eduado Perez, Jeyson Diaz, José Maysonet, Damian Suren, Luis Alvarado, John Acevedo, Ali Figueroa, Heric Leon and Luis Ramirez. The authors also thank Joanelis Medina, José Perez and Jesus Vazquez for testing mosquito pools, and Stephen Waterman, Ryan Hemme and Gilberto Felix for helpful discussions and support. This investigation was fully funded by the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
The authors declare no conflicts of interest.
